text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Purchaser" means a person who has contracted to acquire a vacation club membership.

section.section: "Sales agent" means a person who has contracted to sell a vacation club membership.
"Sales agent" includes the developer of a vacation club membership plan.

text.section: "Vacation accommodation" means a place of lodging and related facilities over which the user does not have permanent exclusive control.

section.section: "Vacation club membership" means an interest in a vacation club membership plan that entitles the purchaser to the use or occupancy of a vacation accommodation on a recurring basis, whether or not the exercise of the right to use or occupy depends on the availability of a vacation accommodation.
"Vacation club membership" includes an interest in a club that provides or arranges for the use or occupancy of campgrounds, condominiums, or other vacation accommodations.
"Vacation club membership" does not include a time-share defined under Title 11A of the Real Property Article.

text.section: "Vacation club membership plan" means a plan in which the purchaser has the right to the use or occupancy of any number of vacation accommodations on a recurring basis.
